summary: P1 Data Transition Testing Complete - Verified that Contacts.jsx and Campaigns.jsx are using getUnifiedContacts() and /hubspot/sectors endpoint uses unified_companies collection. All backend tests pass (10/10). Frontend UI loads contacts correctly with 103,253 total contacts.
critical_code_review_comments: pages/Contacts.jsx is imported in App.js but not used in any Route - can be removed or route added if needed
The main Contacts page is served via AllContacts.jsx at /focus/assets/contacts route which uses api.get('/contacts')
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Session token ebb002fc-685e-4806-bb8b-08ad63f2811e still valid for gerardo.betancourt@leaderlix.com. Data transition to unified_contacts and unified_companies verified working correctly.

GET_api_contacts.notes: Returns contacts from unified_contacts collection. Tested with limit, stage, search parameters.

GET_api_hubspot_sectors.notes: Returns sectors with company_count from unified_companies collection aggregation.

Contacts_page_ui.notes: Page loads correctly showing 103,253 contacts with stages, personas, companies displayed in table.

Campaigns_page_ui.notes: Page loads correctly showing campaigns with recipients, events, status badges.

contacts_search.notes: Global search autocomplete and filter search both work correctly with unified_contacts data.

data_source_verification.notes: Confirmed Contacts.jsx uses getUnifiedContacts(), Campaigns.jsx uses getUnifiedContacts(), /hubspot/sectors uses db.unified_companies

code_verification.legacy_py_sectors: Lines 1763-1770 aggregate company counts from db.unified_companies
